meaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical> put <radical>flowers</radical> on a <radical>cliff</radical>. That is their <radical>task</radical>. It is to <kanji>provide</kanji> and <kanji>equip</kanji> the cliff with flowers.
readingMnemonic: Why do they <kanji>provide</kanji> and <kanji>equip</kanji> the cliff with flowers? It's all for the <reading>bee</reading>s (び).
